jobDescription:
Software Test Developer:

Location:  Remote

 Responsibilities

Working closely with developers to create and maintain tests across AI projects
Create automated test pipelines in GitHub
Create and design dedicated testing projects (in C# or Python)
Aid in the curation of test data
Create unit/api tests for different system components
Create integration tests between different system components
Create automated performance tests for system components
Update existing components to make them more testable
Monitor, report on and increase test coverage across the codebase
Participate in team sprints, standups, and other agile activities
Tech Experience
Required
C# - .NET 8+ (MSTest unit testing framework)
Python 3.12+ (Pytest unit testing framework)
Mocking of classes, databases, services
GitHub Actions
Experience with a variety of testing frameworks
Experience in testing methodologies of system component functionality and performance
Experience with Visual Studio and VS Code
Recommended
Experience with AWS (Lambda, Cognito, CloudWatch, Aurora, Bedrock, VPC)
Experience with Angular 18+ & Typescript
To be clear, this wouldn’t be a traditional role of “automating QA test cases” – it would be working much more closely with the development team to create tests at the code level.
